overview:
Bonnie is the Chief Financial Officer of OpenView. In addition to her role at OpenView, Bonnie continues to work as a Principal in a part time oversight capacity for the Insight finance group where she previously served as Controller, having joined the firm in 1999.

Previously, Bonnie was CFO of Genesis Park LP, a private equity firm in Houston, and also spent nearly three years as CFO of Capital Royalty LP, providing finance and SEC compliance services to this private equity, regulated investment advisor.

Bonnie is a CPA and graduated from Brooklyn College with a BS degree in accounting and mathematics.

Source: OpenView Venture Partners
